Question & Options:
What relationships exist among the characters in the movie *Kahaani*?
Options:
A. A) Vidya Balan's character is married to Indraneil Sengupta's character.
B. B) Indraneil Sengupta and Dhritiman Chatterjee both work in the Intelligence Bureau.
C. C) Dhritiman Chatterjee and Nawazuddin Siddiqui's characters are both involved in Intelligence Bureau operations.
D. D) All of the above

Which characters in *Kahaani* are associated with the Intelligence Bureau?
Options:
A. A) A. Khan
B. B) Arnab Bagchi
C. C) K. Bhaskaran
D. D) All of the above

Which characters in *Kahaani* are associated with the Intelligence Bureau?
Options:
A. A) Parambrata Chatterjee as ASI Satyaki 'Rana' Sinha
B. B) Nawazuddin Siddiqui as Deputy Inspector General A. Khan
C. C) Indraneil Sengupta as Arnab Bagchi
D. D) Dhritiman Chatterjee as Director of Intelligence Bureau K. Bhaskaran
Correct Answer: A) Parambrata Chatterjee as ASI Satyaki 'Rana' Sinha, B) Nawazuddin Siddiqui as Deputy Inspector General A. Khan, C) Indraneil Sengupta as Arnab Bagchi, D) Dhritiman Chatterjee as Director of Intelligence Bureau K. Bhaskaran

D. D) All of the above

B. B) Vidya Balan and Indraneil Sengupta are husband and wife in the film.

Correct Answer: A) Abir Chatterjee and Vidya Balan portray a married couple., B) Vidya Balan and Indraneil Sengupta are husband and wife in the film., C) Indraneil Sengupta and Dhritiman Chatterjee both have roles related to the Intelligence Bureau.
